answers.answer: I have the same issue I go in on Saturday for the test, don't worry until you have to. I only have eleven days until I'm due so I know exactly how you feel.

Yes it happened to me but i didnt find out until i was about to go into labor they diagnosed me with something call preeclampsia an i had to be on medicine an wasnt allowed to get my baby unless someone was in the room with me

I went to the doctor this past monday and I was put on bed rest my bp usually is at 116 over 65 but it was 134/80 it has been spiking since then 145/93 and 154/63 its been weird. My doc told me to lay on my left side to help the blood flow and reduce swelling. He also told me I could have the starting of pre clampsia

question: Sooo my doctor wants me to go to the hospital Friday to get a stress test done, because I have high blood pressure and if it doesn't go down, I might have to get induced.. I'm so worried. How do I make my blood pressure go down? :/ Did this happen to anyone before?
title: 6 Days Left with High Blood Pressure
